CA2254.shortDescription: Template should be a static expression
CA2254.fullDescription: The logging message template should not vary between calls.

CS8618.shortDescription: Non-nullable field must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor. Consider declaring as nullable.

S125.shortDescription: Sections of code should not be commented out
S125.fullDescription: Programmers should not comment out code as it bloats programs and reduces readability.

S2068.fullDescription: Because it is easy to extract strings from an application source code or binary, credentials should not be hard-coded. This is particularly true for applications that are distributed or that are open-source.

S4507.shortDescription: Delivering code in production with debug features activated is security-sensitive
S4507.fullDescription: Delivering code in production with debug features activated is security-sensitive. It has led in the past to the following vulnerabilities:

SA0001.fullDescription: XML comment analysis can only be performed when the project is configured to parse documentation comments. To enable this functionality, update the project to produce an XML documentation file as part of the build.

SA1101.fullDescription: A call to an instance member of the local class or a base class is not prefixed with 'this.', within a C# code file.

SA1116.shortDescription: Split parameters should start on line after declaration
SA1116.fullDescription: The parameters to a C# method or indexer call or declaration span across multiple lines, but the first parameter does not start on the line after the opening bracket.

SA1200.shortDescription: Using directives should be placed correctly
SA1200.fullDescription: A C# using directive is placed outside of a namespace element.

SA1208.shortDescription: System using directives should be placed before other using directives
SA1208.fullDescription: A using directive which declares a member of the 'System' namespace appears after a using directive which declares a member of a different namespace, within a C# code file.

SA1210.shortDescription: Using directives should be ordered alphabetically by namespace
SA1210.fullDescription: The using directives within a C# code file are not sorted alphabetically by namespace.

SA1300.shortDescription: Element should begin with upper-case letter
SA1300.fullDescription: The name of a C# element does not begin with an upper-case letter.

SA1309.shortDescription: Field names should not begin with underscore
SA1309.fullDescription: A field name in C# begins with an underscore.

SA1516.shortDescription: Elements should be separated by blank line
SA1516.fullDescription: Adjacent C# elements are not separated by a blank line.

SA1517.shortDescription: Code should not contain blank lines at start of file
SA1517.fullDescription: The code file has blank lines at the start.

SA1633.fullDescription: A C# code file is missing a standard file header.
